process.name: Unsaved Changes Prompt for Security Sign On Settings
process.narrative: US-7934 add unsaved changes prompt to System> Security - Sign On Settings

subsheet.name: Undo unsaved changes gives no prompt
Navigate to alternate part of Tree

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: Given you have permission to access System> Security> Sign On Settings...and make changes to the Sign On Settings...

stage.name: Note2
stage.narrative: WHEN you navigate to a different part of system tree without saving changes...THEN unsaved changes prompt will appear.

stage.name: Note3
stage.narrative: WHEN you navigate to a different tab...THEN unsaved changes prompt will appear.

stage.name: Note4
stage.narrative: WHEN you attempt to sign out...THEN unsaved changes prompt will appear.

stage.name: Note5
stage.narrative: WHEN you attempt to close the application...THEN unsaved changes prompt will appear.

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Sign in Active Directorry
input.narrative: Do you want sign in using Active Directory

input.name: Sign in
input.narrative: Do you want sign in using legacy sso environment

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

stage.name: Click 'Sign on Settings' From System Tree

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: Enforce Upper-case
input.narrative: False by default. True or False, do you want to force upper case characters in a password.

input.name: Enforce Lower-case
input.narrative: False by default. True or False, do you want to force lower case characters in a password.

input.name: Enforce Digits
input.narrative: False by default. True or False, do you want to force digits in a password.

input.name: Enforce Special
input.narrative: False by default. True or False, do you want to force special characters in a password.

input.name: Enforce Brackets
input.narrative: False by default. True or False, do you want to force brackets in a password.

input.name: Must contain characters
input.narrative: A list of characters that the password must specifically contain.

input.name: Enforce minimum password length
input.narrative: False by default. True or False, do you want to force a minimum ammount of characters for the password.

input.name: Minimum password length?
input.narrative: The minimum ammount of characters you need to use in your password.

input.name: Set Password can't match previous <number> passwords?
input.friendlyname: Set Password can't match previous <number> passwords?

input.name: Set Password can't match previous password within <number> days?
input.friendlyname: Set Password can't match previous password within <number> days?

output.name: Read Upper Case
output.narrative: Read Value for Upper Case selection

stage.name: Navigate to alternate part of Tree
Navigate to alternate part of Tree
Click different Node From System Tree

input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Unsaved Changes warning
input.narrative: Is Unsaved Changes expected?

stage.name: Press Apply to save Sign on Settings

stage.name: Unsaved Changes prompt did not appear

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

stage.name: Press Apply to save Sign on Settings
Note7
stage.narrative: GIVEN you undo the unsaved changes (meaning nothing has changed)...WHEN you navigate to a different tab...THEN the unsaved changes prompt will NOT appear.

stage.name: Press Apply to save Sign on Settings
Note1
stage.narrative: Given you have permission to access System> Security> Sign On Settings...and make changes to the Sign On Settings...

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

stage.name: Note6
stage.narrative: GIVEN you opt to SAVE your changes...

stage.name: Note8
stage.narrative: WHEN you navigate away from the page and back again...THEN changes are saved.

output.name: Unsaved changes Prompt text
output.narrative: Unsaved changes prompt text that was read.

stage.name: Expected Values if Save has worked

decision.expression: [Read Upper Case Value] = True AND [Read Digits Value] = True

exception.detail: "Changes not saved when save was expected"
